title: 外國勢力大雜燴！南亞同鬼都係齊到！

replies.msg:
入面個白人鬼妹真心識玩
"...I think that white chicks can get away with a lot of stuff in general, so if there’s an opportunity to stand up for what is right in a risky situation – where it is more risky for other people to do – then we should do it and we should leverage that privilege, and represent on their behalf, and take advantage of the minimised risk of being white and blonde and a chick.”
